ygData.messageBody:
Well, I met a lvl 40 wizard yesterday who desired to learn a language, and in the course of teaching him we ended up conversing for several hours, seeing the world via Evac, and I teaching him all I knew in the art of language.

Tho I didnt ask for anything in return, he gave me a sack of runes and a staff of writhing. Ive been piercing for so long (95) my 1hblunt is 31, and so the staff isnt much use to me, while the runes definitely are! But I think the best thing I got was his time, companionship and advice.

Languages are useful because they allow you to meet other people that you might not have before.

Shannyn on Tunare. 1 and a half bubbles from 29



>>> Lomack <lomack@...> 01/12/00 06:37PM >>>
From: Lomack <lomack@...>

>>Over the weekend I mastered the last languages I had yet to complete, and
>>now
>>have all of them maxed. :) I love it.
>
>>Shannyn
>
>You got them *all* maxed? Impressive! I've only mastered all the research
>languages including such things as elder dragon and erudian. But I'm in no
>way inclined to go through the trouble of getting some of the evil race
>languages up like Orcs and Gnoll languages. :P

Actually I got to excelent in all the languages a while back, it wasn't
being bored. It was in the hopes that verant would put in quest that
required you to speak to the NPC is a specific language to be able to
converse with them. Wishful thinking on my part. But it would give those
languages a use. :)
